title: Create FO-06 directory structure and layout files
description:
Create the FO-06 directory structure based on FO-05.

Files to create:
- `app/fo-06/page.tsx` - Route entry (basic placeholder)
- `app/fo-06/layout.tsx` - Layout file (copy from FO-05)
- `app/fo-06/fo-06-layout-client.tsx` - Client layout (copy from FO-05)
- `app/fo-06/components/` - Create empty components directory
- `app/fo-06/info/page.tsx` - Info page (copy from FO-05, update for FO-06)

Reference: `app/fo-05/` for structure

⚠️ Do not close until all files are created and the dev server can load /fo-06 without errors.
acceptance_criteria: Files exist at app/fo-06/page.tsx, app/fo-06/layout.tsx; navigating to /fo-06 in browser shows placeholder content
closed_reason: Created FO-06 directory structure: page.tsx (placeholder), layout.tsx, fo-06-layout-client.tsx, info/page.tsx, and components/.gitkeep. All files pass TypeScript and ESLint validation.
